topic.title: I'm here to help, ask me questions please!
topic.body: Bored and want good questions to answer fo free!

1534889280_19XhqfSemghmQf4m6SZVkw78qW6WK.body: English my primary so use google translate for anything else and i'll figure it out. Don't be discouraged by any language barriers. I know 1 or 0 so we can figure it out okay? Please, entertain me with good discourse!
